item.description:
"PLEASE JOIN US FOR A VICTORIAN SEANCE ON SATURDAY, MARCH 2ND AT 3:30 & 4:30 AT THE QUINCY SPIRITUALIST CHURCH Join us as we take a step back in time to the roots of Modern Spiritualism and recreate a Victorian Seance to warm your hearts during the Winter Season!

We will be exploring message work through seances, intimate group circles of 4-6 sitters paired with Mediums to bring through messages from Spirit.

Admission is $30.00, with a portion of the funds to go to the Rev. Rita Berkowitz Scholarship Fund.

Groups of up to six are welcome but please make a reservation. Individual reservations are also recommended, walk-ins are welcome.

The Seance will be held in a darkened room, lit with lamp light and the mediums will be dressed in Victorian attire.

Following the Seance, join us downstairs for a Victorian tea. Drink tea from china cups and enjoy tea breads and cookies prepared and served in an authenic, period manner.

Â

group.name: The First Spiritualist Church of Quincy

item.name: Victorian Seance
